comment: @Fight4HongKong We want to confirm that videos that focus on coronavirus fall under the sensitive topics advertiser-friendly guideline. This is why they result in limited or no ads (yellow icons). You can review the ad-friendly guidelines in more detail here: https://t.co/1QaeHtxQmy

Hong Kong pro-democracy YouTubers says their vids are demonetized without reasons.Sam Ng, co-creator of political satire show Headliner, says his vid abt his show got demonetized. His interaction with .@TeamYoutube makes him question if his contents are politically censored. https://t.co/Qp88j0U53N
